devdoc.details: Manages the storage of matched data after successful matching with Filecoin storage deals.

AdminChanged(address,address).details: Emitted when the admin account has changed.

BeaconUpgraded(address).details: Emitted when the beacon is changed.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

StorageClaimIdSubmitted(uint64,uint64,ui.details: Submits a Filecoin claim ID for a matched store after successful matching.

params._matchingId: The ID of the matching store.

Upgraded(address).details: Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.

getClientLockPayment(uint64).details: Get the client allow payment amount

getProviderLockPayment(uint64).details: Get the provider allow payment amount

getStoredCarCount(uint64).details: Gets the count of done cars in the matchedstore.

getStoredCarSize(uint64,uint64).details: Gets the car size in the matchedstore.

getStoredCars(uint64).details: Gets the list of done cars in the matchedstore.

getTotalStoredSize(uint64).details: Gets the stored size in the matchedstore.

isAllStoredDone(uint64).details: Checks if all cars are done in the matchedstore.

isStorageExpiration(uint64).details: Checks if store expiration in the matchedstore.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

submitStorageClaimIds(uint64,uint64,uint.details: Submits multiple Filecoin claim Ids for a matchedstore after successful matching.

params._claimIds: An array of IDs of successful Filecoin storage deals.
params._ids: An array of content identifiers of the matched data.
params._provider: A provider of storage provider of matching.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

__gap.details: This empty reserved space is put in place to allow future versions to add new

devdoc.title: storages

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: initialize function to initialize the contract and grant the default admin role to the deployer.
